thread.title: David K Young
thread.title_full: Flologic reviewed by David K Young

author: David K Young
title: David K Young
text: I have been very pleased with the system and it consistency. The only issue I have had is the valve/switch that bypasses it when the water softner is running. It tends to clog with salt occasionally and there should be an easier way to deal with it. Otherwise it is working without issues. I find most plumbers are unaware of the device and I have to explain to them how it works. You may want to educate them through their associations.
